title: Veritas Et Fortitudo v.1.2.2.b - Europa Universalis IV mod
description:
Veritas Et Fortitudo v.1.2.2.b - Europa Universalis IV mod


Update: Sep 14 @ 7:32am
1.2.2b

Fixed crash with Standing Army triggered modifier (Hotfix)
Stability adjustments (Hotfix)
Clean up work on Barbary Pirates events
Reduced cost of level 1 buildings and the first three Road buildings
Reduced global trade efficiency malus of pirate raids
Added province trade power malus to pirate raids
Increased prestige penalty for breaking royal marriages (1 -> 10)
Reduced the ability for Ilkhanate to convert Nestorian provinces at the start
Updated ruler stats for Andronikos II
Added event for Ilkhanate player to recover from collapse
Increased peace time reduction of war exhaustion (-0.10 -> -0.125)
Fixed nations getting incorrect war exhaustion reductions from ideas
Fixed Black Death so that the starting nation does not get the country modifier twice
Fixed Black Death so that the starting nation actually gets it in one of their provinces
Limited Byzantium's ability to warn Turkish minors
Re-enabled the follow-up events for Administrator's province integration
Fixed the Land Forcelimits Modifier given by Defender of the Faith
Added credit for KHL flags
Limited the Scandinavian Ambition mission to Scandinavian culture nations
Changed Granada to Muslim tech group in 1310 start.
Updated history files for some Balkans and Anatolia provinces
Removed the starting war between Byzantium and Venice
Fixed position of some ports in India
Fixed Romania formation decision so that it can actually be formed
Fixed religion for Mamluks' Dumyat province in 1310
Added custom tooltips for stability change in events "Unhappiness among the Artisans" and "Unhappiness among the Peasantry"
Updated starting visibility for Ottoman, Indo-Persian, Indian, and Muslim tech groups
Updated starting visibility for Oman
Updated the starting stats of Osman's ruler and heir.
Fixed event pictures for Carnival events
Increased distance before Distant Overseas penalty
Ghazi states are now more likely to have a militarist ruler
Updated many very low/high Prestige, Legitimacy, and Republican Tradition modifiers (no more +0.00 Yearly Legitimacy modifiers!!!)
Fixed Faction display issues with Angevin Union triggered modifiers
Successor states to Ilkhanate now have proper governments and technology group
Increased mean time to happen and changed cost of "Sawmill Operation" and "Aristocrats Demand Compensation" events to a fixed cost
Wales can now also form Celtica
Fixed some errors with how some national ideas affected national stability level
Significant revisions to various policies and new policies added
Event and mission tweaks
Fix incorrect port location for Oristino
Vassals no longer get the 'Jihad' attitude towards their overlords
